CDSiC Leadership Viewpoints

The CDSiC leadership team has developed these viewpoints to share their perspectives on current patient-centered clinical decision support (PC CDS) topics, including challenges, opportunities, recent developments, and future directions. These viewpoints are also intended to keep patients, health care providers, developers, researchers, and anyone interested current on how the CDSiC aims to advance PC CDS.

Moving the Needle on Advancing Patient-Centered Clinical Decision Support through the CDSiC’s Four Workgroups

This CDSiC Leadership Viewpoint provides an overview of the Stakeholder Center’s four Workgroups and how their products will contribute to patient-centered clinical decision support (PC CDS).

POSTED February 3, 2023 BY Prashila Dullabh, MD, FAMIA; Priyanka Desai, PhD, MSPH, CPH; Elizabeth Cope, PhD, MPH; Rina Dhopeshwarkar, MPH; James Swiger, MBE; Edwin Lomotan, MD
